metadata.name: RestoredMonstersPack
metadata.description:
Forgotten enemies have returned to the basement! Restored Monsters Pack is a culmination of all of Team Compliance's enemy mods, featuring over 35+ enemies and 7000+ rooms!
[img]Promo Image[/img]
[img]Features Image[/img] Restored Monsters Pack Features:
[*]35+ enemies, ranging from unused monsters left in Repentance to new enemies based of developer concepts [*]A new TNT variant [*]7000+ new rooms, with some from the original Antibirth mod [*]Reworks and polishing of some of the enemies from their previous iterations (No more Dumplings camping rocks!) [*](Coming soon)Compatibility with mods that add new floors, such as Revelations. You can read more about the enemies added by this mod on our wiki! (link wiki)
[img]Notice Image[/img] The following mods are included in some form within Restored Monsters Pack, and should not be used in conjuntion with it:
[*]Cut Monsters by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]Antibirth Monsters by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]Antibirth Minus by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/76561198081320400]Sinbiscut[/url] [*]Strifers by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz]PixelPlz[/url] [*]Corpse Eaters by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/PixelPlz]PixelPlz[/url] [*]Dumplings by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/24chrome]24Chrome[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/jubbalub]Jubbalub[/url], and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/We_Strvn]We Strvn[/url] [*]Ghost Babel by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/76561198081320400]Sinbiscut[/url]
[img]Credits Image[/img] [*][u]Directors[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/We_Strvn]We Strvn[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198170829227]Gabriel[/url] [*][u]Coders[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198239545954]watchmeojo[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/fly_6/]fly_6[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/goganidze/]Goganidze[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198353126873]RedStinger665[/url] [*][u]Room Designers[/u] = infinitecosmos1, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/We_Strvn]We Strvn[/url] [*][u]Artists[/u] = lecrack42, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198821357749]SkeleJ64[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198353126873]RedStinger665[/url] [*][u]Playtesters[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude/]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Sillst[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/SharkyTheShark19/]shrki_[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]Public Entertainment Networked Interactive Software[/u] - For the original Antibirth mod as well as the content and concepts that this mod builds off of [u]Peas[/u] - For Dumpling enemy line and Strifer sprites[/code]
